title: India Posts 8.2% GDP Growth – Officially World's Fastest Growing Major Economy
shortdescription: Surpasses China for third straight year – set to become #3 economy by 2027.
description: Services exports, manufacturing boom, and infrastructure spending drive growth — IMF upgrades India to 8% for 2025-26.
author: Macro Anton

title: January Jobs Report: Hiring Tops Expectations as Unemployment Falls to 4.3%
shortdescription: The US added 130,000 jobs in January 2026, beating forecasts as unemployment fell to 4.3%. Strong headlines mask weak trends and heavy 2025 revisions.
description: US labor market surprises with 130K jobs, but 2025 revisions reveal weakness. Hiring tops expectations as unemployment falls to 4.3% while warning signs remain.
author: Macro Anton

title: Hawaii Faces Economic Crisis: Rising Costs, Low Wages, and Declining Population
shortdescription: Hawaii's population has steadily declined due to rising costs and stagnant wages.
description: New research highlights the state's growing economic challenges and the exodus of working families.
author: Macro Anton
